Message.Title: Ouya is #86 on Amazon's Best Seller List July 7, 2013. Ouya is DONE
Message.Msg: Lets see you Nvidia fans pump Ouya sitting in the #86 spot out of 100 on Amazon's Best Seller List as good news. Even Pre-Orders for ACCESSORIES for the yet released PS4 and Xbox One are OUT SELLING Ouya. Ouya is headed for an early eBay grave, on its tomb stone you'll find the words "USED ONCE". Ouya is DONE. IMHO

Message.Title: Xbox One #4 and PS4 #13 Pre-Orders Moved UP on Amazon's Best Seller List.
Message.Msg: Update July 7, 2013 Xbox One is #4 and PS4 is #13 on Amazon's Best Seller List. Both Pre-Orders Moved UP from last week, not down like Ouya but UP and neither one is available today. lol Consumers would rather wait for a REAL Game Console than blow good money on JUNK. IMHO

Message.Title: That #86 Ouya showing on Amazon's Best Seller List is what awaits SHIELD
Message.Msg: SHIELD will be right there next to Ouya near the bottom of the list weeks after the initial sales buz wares off JUST LIKE Ouya. If a $99 Ouya sits in the #86 then a $299 SHIELD should be lower given they are BOTH JUNK only SHIELD is the more expensive JUNK. Watch SHIELD fade fast IF Nvidia ever gets it act together and ships one. IMHO

Message.Title: It can't be saved by a Reprieve to July or a $299 Reprice 2nd Try, SHIELD is going to DIE
Message.Msg: POS SHIELD is already in the bowl as Nvidia tries to delay the inevitable FLUSH with that lame excuse about a "mechanical problem" . We don't know how Pre-Orders went before that Embarrassing Almost Launch but Nvidia did. We don't know what parts are broken on SHIELD but the real mechanical problem with SHIELD is that it was ever assembled in the first place. lol SHIELD is going to DIE if Nvidia ever gets around to shipping one. IMHO

Message.Title: Can dual GTX 760s Outperform A Titan?
Message.Msg: "Crunching The Numbers: Can Dual $269 Nvidia GTX 760s Outperform A $999 Titan?" Spoiler alert: yes for $460 less. I don't see this as a bad thing. The bottom line is more enthusiasts will enjoy NVDA graphics now that you can get world-dominating performance at a much lower price point. NVDA leapfrogging itself cemets performance leadership as ATI/AMD just doesn't have the juice this generation (or maybe ever going forward the way things are going). Article on forbes, pretty interesting.

Topic.Title: Can dual GTX 760s Outperform A Titan?

Message.Msg: "I don't see this as a bad thing. The bottom line is more enthusiasts will enjoy NVDA graphics" You wouldn't because you LUVs Nvidia right? lol But the real bottom line, since the term "bottom line" refers to profits and NOT enthusiasts enjoyment is what did you say: "Spoiler alert: yes for $460 less."? How is LESS money dropping down to the REAL BOTTOM LINE for Nvidia NOT a bad thing? lmao Carry on you're doing just fine bashing Nvidia without any help. imho

Topic.Title: Brit server maker Avantek puts its back into ARM servers

"So Jen/PD is now going to do 'HPC'!!! " Glad even you can grasp the obvious... took you a few yrs "Atoms will be coming with qlgc's IB interconnects. " So.... " No wonder getanid gave it all up" Defeated by the new yahoo boards... "PD, that is nvda's future" Yup....till then, it's just sabre rattling....

Message.Title: Ouya at #90 on Amazon's Best Seller List now is just ahead of a Wall Charger. lol
Message.Msg: Ouya is competing for the #90 spot with a Wall Charger. I said A Wall Charger Nvidia fans. A Wall Charger for a Nintendo DS Lite is moving up and pressuring Ouya a for the #90 spot. I kid you not, A Wall Charger? lmao imho

Topic.Title: That #86 Ouya showing on Amazon's Best Seller List is what awaits SHIELD

Message.Msg: Do you think Nvidia would rather delay SHIELD than see this kind of showing on the Amazon Best Seller List? What happens if SHIELD puts up that kind of showing Nvidia fans? Do you think SHIELD will do better than a $99 Ouya? lol Do you? imho

Message.Title: Bad News: Ouya is IN STOCK and now #95 on Amazon's Best Seller List.
Message.Msg: Updated again July 7, 2013 Ouya now #95 and IN STOCK Its up to you Nvidia fans to keep Ouya on Amazon's Best Seller List now since it seems NO ONE ELSE wants to waste good money on JUNK. Another embarrassing update is that Wall Charger that was behind Ouya has now blown past Ouya. lol Ouya out sold by a sexy Wall Charger. lol IMHO

Topic.Title: Bad News: Ouya is IN STOCK and now #95 on Amazon's Best Seller List.

Message.Msg: Meanwhile Pre-Orders for Xbox One is #3 and PS4 is #13. Pre-Orders are out selling IN STOCK #95 Ouya by a wide margin Nvidia fans. Does anyone here have a clue why that is? imho

Message.Title: Leaked Intel Bay Trail lineup: Atom, Celeron, and Pentium chips use less than 10W
Message.Msg: SOURCE: LIliputing, 07/2013 Here’s the breakdown: Intel Bay Trail-I (Atom, likely for tablets, notebooks) Atom E3810 – 1.46 GHz single core CPU w/400 MHz GPU and 5W TDP Atom E3821 – 1.33 GHz dual-core CPU w/533 MHz GPU and 6W TDP Atom E3822 – 1.46 GHz dual-core CPU w/667 MHz GPU and 7W TDP Atom E3823 – 1.75 GHz dual-core CPU w/792 MHz GPU and 8W TDP Atom E3840 – 1.91 GHz quad-core CPU w/792 MHz GPU and 10W TDP Intel Bay Trail-M (Celeron, Pentium for notebooks, convertibles) Celeron N2805 – 1.46 GHz dual-core CPU w/667 MHz GPU and 4.5W TDP Celeron N2810 – 2 GHz dual-core CPU w/756 MHz GPU and 7.5W TDP Celeron N2910 – 1.6 GHz quad-core CPU w/756 MHz GPU and 7.5W TDP Pentium N3510 – 2 GHz quad-core CPU w/750 MHz GPU and 7.5W TDP Intel Bay Trail-D (Desktops) Celeron J1750 – 2.41 GHz dual-core CPU w/792 MHz GPU and 10W TDP Celeron J1850 – 2 GHz quad-core CPU w/792 MHz GPU and 10W TDP Pentium J2850 – 2.41 GHz quad-core CPU w/792 MHz GPU and 10W TDP _____ --As a general rule, you need

Topic.Title: Leaked Intel Bay Trail lineup: Atom, Celeron, and Pentium chips use less than 10W

Message.Msg: Just realized that Yahoo cut off my postscript remark to the prior post due to length. Here it is again: --It needs to be under 5w to be in tablets and comparable devices --It needs to be under 2w to be in smartphones --TDP for Tegra 4: 4-5w depending on the sources --TD{ fpr Tegra 4i: 1w or under
